definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Then they got into the seaplane.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们去了水上飞机。

sentences.english: Was that a yellow and white Cessna 206 seaplane?
sentences.chinese: 是黄白色的塞斯纳206水上飞机吗？

sentences.english: She would be able to launch seaplanes by using light jettisonable trolleys .
sentences.chinese: 它能用轻便的抛射推车发射水上飞机。

sentences.english: Seaplane mainly responsible for the airport to distant island transportation service.
sentences.chinese: 水上飞机主要负责机场到较远岛屿的接送。

sentences.english: Mornant. "We can do that with our seaplane."
sentences.chinese: 我们能用我们的水上飞机做这件事。

sentences.english: She would be able to launch seaplanes by using light jettisonable trolleys.
sentences.chinese: 它能用轻便的抛射推车发射水上飞机。

sentences.english: Mauricetter was looking at the place where the seaplane had been.
sentences.chinese: 莫丽塞特看着水上飞机曾经待的地方。

sentences.english: Even the successful flying boats proved, in the end, uneconomical.
sentences.chinese: 即使是成功的水上飞机最终也未能盈利。

sentences.english: The preparation and manufacture process of FRP float bowl of seaplane are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍水上飞机玻璃钢浮筒制备及工艺。

sentences.english: A hydroplane navigated over the lake.
sentences.chinese: 一架水上飞机从湖面上飞驰而过。

sentences.english: He watched the seaplane landing on water.
sentences.chinese: 他看著水上飞机在海面上降落。

sentences.english: The designer of marine aircraft demonstrated his newest hydroplane.
sentences.chinese: 那个水上飞机设计师演示了他的最新水上飞机。

sentences.english: The designer of marine aircraft demonstrated his newest hydroplane.
sentences.chinese: 那个水上飞机设计师演示了他的最新水上飞机。

sentences.english: People could also travel to the mainland by motorboat or water plane.
sentences.chinese: 人们也可以乘坐摩托艇或水上飞机去大陆旅游。

sentences.english: Flying boat n. A large seaplane that floats on its hull rather than on pontoons.
sentences.chinese: 一种以船身而不以浮筒滑行的巨大的水上飞机。

sentences.english: I must leave my dear friends with you while I am in the seaplane.
sentences.chinese: 当我在水上飞机的时候，我必须把我的朋友交给你。

definition: (of aircraft) to take off and land
aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
see 直升機|直升机[zhi2 sheng1 ji1]
aircraft carrier/abbr. for 航空母艦|航空母舰[hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4]
name used for many fishing birds/cormorant/osprey
